thing-type.label: Heating Device
thing-type.description: Heating device such as a boiler

channel-type.label: Device Serial Number
channel-type.description: Serial number of the connected device

channel-type.label: Common Supply Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the status and the value of the temperature sensor located on the exit of the boiler

channel-type.label: Boiler Serial Number
channel-type.description: Shows the serial number of the boiler

channel-type.label: Boiler Target Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the set target temperature value of the boiler

channel-type.label: Burner Status
channel-type.description: Shows the state of the burner i.e. on or off

channel-type.label: Burner Modulation
channel-type.description: Shows the current burner modulation in percent

channel-type.label: Burner Hours
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of burner: hours and times started

channel-type.label: Burner Starts
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of burner: hours and times started

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Circulation Pump Status
channel-type.description: Shows the state of the circulation pump (on, off) for heating circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Frost Protection
channel-type.description: Shows whether frost protection of the installation is turned on for the device on Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Name
channel-type.description: Shows the name given for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Name
channel-type.description: Shows the name given for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Supply Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the value of the supply temperature sensor for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Supply Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the supply temperature sensor for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Zone Mode Active
channel-type.description: Shows if a zone is connected to Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Compressor ${heatingCompressor}
channel-type.description: Shows whether compressor ${heatingCompressor} is active

channel-type.label: Heating Compressor ${heatingCompressor} Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether compressor ${heatingCompressor} is active

channel-type.label: Heating Compressor ${heatingCompressor} Hours
channel-type.description: Shows the number of working hours of Heating Compressor ${heatingCompressor}

channel-type.label: Heating Compressor ${heatingCompressor} Starts
channel-type.description: Shows the number of starts of Heating Compressor ${heatingCompressor}

channel-type.label: DHW active
channel-type.description: Whether domestic hot water (DHW) is activated

channel-type.label: DHW Charging Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the hot water charging for the DHW storage is currently active.

channel-type.label: DHW One Time Charge
channel-type.description: Shows whether the one-time charge of domestic hot water is active.

channel-type.label: Activate DHW One Time Charge
channel-type.description: The command to activate the one-time charge of domestic hot water. The command will be sent when this channel receives the ON command.

channel-type.label: Deactivate DHW One Time Charge
channel-type.description: The command to deactivate the one-time charge of domestic hot water. The command will be sent when this channel receives the ON command.

channel-type.label: DHW Status
channel-type.description: Status of domestic hot water (DHW)

channel-type.label: DHW Primary Pump Status
channel-type.description: Status of the domestic hot water (DHW) primary pump

channel-type.label: DHW Circulation Pump Status
channel-type.description: Status of the domestic hot water (DHW) circulation pump

channel-type.label: Hot Water Storage ${pretty:0} Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the value of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage at the ${pretty:0}

channel-type.label: Hot Water Storage ${pretty:0} Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage at the ${pretty:0}

channel-type.label: DHW Outlet Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the status and the value of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage at the outlet

channel-type.label: DHW Outlet Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage at the outlet

channel-type.label: DHW Storage Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the value of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage

channel-type.label: DHW Storage Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage.

channel-type.label: DHW Hysteresis
channel-type.description: Shows the hysteresis value of the Domestic Hot Water temperature in heat pumps.

channel-type.label: DHW Target Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the target temperature value of the domestic hot water (DHW).

channel-type.label: DHW Temp2 Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the target value of the domestic hot water (DHW) Temp2 temperature.

channel-type.label: Outside Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the temperature value of the outside temperature sensor

channel-type.label: Outside Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the outside temperature sensor

channel-type.label: Heating Return Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the flow return temperature, i.e. water temperature on return to the boiler from the heating installation.

channel-type.label: Heating Return Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the flow return temperature sensor status

channel-type.label: Heating Return Flow
channel-type.description: Shows the volumetric flow on the return.

channel-type.label: Heating Return Flow Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the volumetric flow sensor status

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Heating Curve Slope
channel-type.description: Shows the value for slope of the heating curve for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Heating Curve Shift
channel-type.description: Shows the value for shift of the heating curve for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Active Operating Mode
channel-type.description: Shows the current active operating mode on the device for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} ${pretty:0} Operating Mode Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the ${pretty:0} operating mode is active for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}.

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} DHW Operating Mode Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the domestic hot water (DHW) only operating mode is active for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}.

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} DHW And Heating Operating Mode Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the domestic hot water (DHW) and heating operating mode is active for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}.

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Standby Operating Mode Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the Standby operating mode is active now for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}. In this mode, the device will only start heating to protect installation from frost. Other commands, e.g. charging of DHW (oneTimeCharge), are still executable while this operating mode is active.

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Active Operating Program
channel-type.description: Shows the current active operating program on the device for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Extended Heating Active
channel-type.description: If activated, the last program activated by the schedule will be sustained until this feature is deactivated.

channel-type.label: Holiday Operating Program Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the holiday program is active

channel-type.label: Holiday Operating Program Start
channel-type.description: Shows the start date of the holiday program

channel-type.label: Holiday Operating Program End
channel-type.description: Shows the end date of the holiday program

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} ${pretty:0} Operating Program Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the ${pretty:0} operating program target temperature for heating circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} ${pretty:0} Operating Program Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the ${pretty:0} operating program is active for heating circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} ${pretty:0} Operating Program Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the device is currently in the Energy Saving operating mode while the ${pretty:operatingProgram} operating program is scheduled on heating circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Room Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the temperature value of the room temperature sensor for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Room Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the room temperature sensor for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Minimum Temperature Level
channel-type.description: Shows the lower limit of the supply temperature for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit} Maximum Temperature Level
channel-type.description: Shows the upper limit of the supply temperature for Heating Circuit ${heatingCircuit}

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Current Day
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the current day

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Previous Day
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the previous day

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Current Week
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the current week

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Previous Week
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the previous week

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Current Month
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the current month

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Previous Month
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the previous month

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Current Year
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the current year

channel-type.label: DHW Gas Consumption Previous Year
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up the DHW for the previous year

channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up rooms for the current day

channel-type.label: Heating Gas Consumption Previous Day
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up rooms for the previous day

channel-type.label: Heating Gas Consumption Current Week
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up rooms for the current week

channel-type.description: Shows statistics of gas usage for heating up rooms for the previous week

channel-type.description: Shows whether the holiday at home program is active

channel-type.description: Shows the start date of the holiday at home program

channel-type.label: Primary Circuit Supply Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the temperature value of the primary source's supply-temperature sensor of the heat pump

channel-type.label: Primary Circuit Supply Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the primary source's supply-temperature sensor

channel-type.label: Holiday Operating Program Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the holiday program is active

channel-type.label: Holiday Operating Program Start
channel-type.description: Shows the start date of the holiday program

channel-type.label: Holiday Operating Program End
channel-type.description: Shows the end date of the holiday program

channel-type.label: Secondary Circuit Supply Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the temperature value of the secondary source's supply-temperature sensor of the heat pump

channel-type.label: Secondary Circuit Supply Temperature Sensor Status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the secondary source's supply-temperature sensor

channel-type.label: Solar thermal status
channel-type.description: Shows whether the solar thermal is activated and present on the heating installation

channel-type.label: Solar Power Production - Current Day
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of solar power production for the current day

channel-type.label: Solar Power Production - Previous Day
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of solar power production for the previous day

channel-type.label: Solar Power Production - Current Week
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of solar power production for the current week

channel-type.description: Shows statistics of solar power production for the current year

channel-type.label: Solar Power Production - Previous Year
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of solar power production for the previous year

channel-type.label: Solar pump status
channel-type.description: Shows the status of the solar pump

channel-type.label: Solar Collector Temperature
channel-type.description: Solar Collector Temperature in °C

channel-type.label: Solar DHW Temperature
channel-type.description: Show solar domestic hot water temperature in °C

channel-type.label: ${pretty:0} Ventilation Mode Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the ${pretty:0} operating mode is active.

channel-type.label: Active Ventilation Operating Mode
channel-type.description: Shows current active operating mode enabled on the device.

channel-type.label: ${pretty:0} Ventilation Operating Program Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the ${pretty:0} program is active.

channel-type.label: Active Ventilation Operating Program
channel-type.description: Shows the current active operating program of the ventilation.

channel-type.label: Ventilation Holiday Operating Program Active
channel-type.description: Shows whether the holiday program is active.
